sn55.54:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
sn55.54:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū bhagavato cīvarakammaṃ karonti:
sn55.54:4.7: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn55.54:4.9: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho mahānāmo sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn55.54:4.13: Na kho netaṃ, bhante, bhagavato sammukhā sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ sappaññena upāsakena sappañño upāsako ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno ovaditabbo”ti.
sn55.54:5.1: “Sappaññena, mahānāma, upāsakena sappañño upāsako ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno catūhi assāsanīyehi dhammehi assāsetabbo:
sn55.54:5.3: atthāyasmato buddhe aveccappasādo itipi so bhagavā … pe …
sn55.54:6.1: Sappaññena, mahānāma, upāsakena sappañño upāsako ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno imehi catūhi assāsanīyehi dhammehi assāsetvā evamassa vacanīyo:
sn55.54:6.4: ‘atthi me mātāpitūsu apekkhā’ti, so evamassa vacanīyo:
sn55.54:6.7: no cepāyasmā mātāpitūsu apekkhaṃ karissati, marissateva.
sn55.54:6.8: Sādhāyasmā, yā te mātāpitūsu apekkhā taṃ pajahā’ti.
sn55.54:7.2: ‘yā me mātāpitūsu apekkhā sā pahīnā’ti, so evamassa vacanīyo:
sn55.54:7.5: ‘atthi me puttadāresu apekkhā’ti, so evamassa vacanīyo:
sn55.54:7.8: no cepāyasmā puttadāresu apekkhaṃ karissati, marissateva.
sn55.54:7.9: Sādhāyasmā, yā te puttadāresu apekkhā taṃ pajahā’ti.
sn55.54:8.2: ‘yā me puttadāresu apekkhā sā pahīnā’ti, so evamassa vacanīyo:
sn55.54:8.5: ‘atthi me mānusakesu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu apekkhā’ti, so evamassa vacanīyo:
sn55.54:8.6: ‘mānusakehi kho, āvuso, kāmehi dibbā kāmā abhikkantatarā ca paṇītatarā ca.
sn55.54:8.7: Sādhāyasmā, mānusakehi kāmehi cittaṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā cātumahārājikesu devesu cittaṃ adhimocehī’ti.
sn55.54:9.2: ‘mānusakehi me kāmehi cittaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ, cātumahārājikesu devesu cittaṃ adhimocitan’ti, so evamassa vacanīyo:
sn55.54:9.3: ‘cātumahārājikehi kho, āvuso, devehi tāvatiṃsā devā abhikkantatarā ca paṇītatarā ca.
sn55.54:9.4: Sādhāyasmā, cātumahārājikehi devehi cittaṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā tāvatiṃsesu devesu cittaṃ adhimocehī’ti.
sn55.54:10.2: ‘cātumahārājikehi me devehi cittaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ, tāvatiṃsesu devesu cittaṃ adhimocitan’ti, so evamassa vacanīyo:
sn55.54:10.3: ‘tāvatiṃsehi kho, āvuso, devehi yāmā devā … pe …
sn55.54:10.7: paranimmitavasavattīhi kho, āvuso, devehi brahmaloko abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
sn55.54:10.8: Sādhāyasmā, paranimmitavasavattīhi devehi cittaṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā brahmaloke cittaṃ adhimocehī’ti.
sn55.54:10.10: ‘paranimmitavasavattīhi me devehi cittaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ, brahmaloke cittaṃ adhimocitan’ti, so evamassa vacanīyo:
sn55.54:10.12: Sādhāyasmā, brahmalokā cittaṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā sakkāyanirodhe cittaṃ upasaṃharāhī’ti.
sn55.54:11.2: ‘brahmalokā me cittaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ, sakkāyanirodhe cittaṃ upasaṃharāmī’ti;
sn55.54:11.3: evaṃ vimuttacittassa kho, mahānāma, upāsakassa āsavā vimuttacittena bhikkhunā na kiñci nānākaraṇaṃ vadāmi, yadidaṃ—
